definition: A means of entry or access to a place, system, or information, often used in the context of gaining physical or digital access to something. It is commonly used to refer to the act of obtaining permission, authorization, or the right to use or approach something.

examples.german: Der Zugang zum Park ist kostenlos.
examples.english: Access to the park is free.

examples.german: Ich habe Zugang zu vertraulichen Informationen.
examples.english: I have access to confidential information.

examples.german: Der Zugang zum Internet ist hier sehr langsam.
examples.english: The internet access here is very slow.

examples.german: Der Zugang zur Bibliothek ist nur für Studenten erlaubt.
examples.english: Access to the library is only allowed for students.

examples.german: Der Zugang zu diesem Gebäude ist barrierefrei.
examples.english: The access to this building is wheelchair accessible.
